moreBlocks.articles:
• d'Oliveira & Associates opens office in Woonsocket, RI, Personal Injury Blog, November 1, 2014
    d’Oliveira & Associates’ new Woonsocket, RI Personal Injury Law Office is located at 62 Hamlet Avenue, Woonsocket, RI 02895. The move will enable the Firm to maintain closer contact with its clients in the Woonsocket, RI area.
  • Middletown/Newport Slip and Fall Lawyer, d'Oliveira & Associates Website
    If you have been injured from a slip and fall accident, you may be entitled to compensation for your medical bills, lost income and pain and suffering, among other losses.
  • Middletown Motorcycle Accident Lawyer, d'Oliveira & Associates Website
    If you have been injured in a motorcycle accident in Middletown, RI you may be able to get a cash settlement for your medical bills, lost income and pain and suffering, among other related types of losses.
  • Middletown Workers’ Compensation Lawyer, d'Oliveira & Associates Website
    If you have been injured while working in Middletown, you may be eligible for workers’ compensation benefits made up of lost wages, medical bills, job retraining and in some cases a lump sum settlement, among other losses.

description:
Newport County's Personal Injury, SSDI And Workers' Compensation Attorneys

Located in Middletown, Rhode Island, the law firm of d'Oliveira & Associates P.C. serves clients throughout Newport County and the surrounding region who need help obtaining justice for the injuries or losses they sustained due to another party's negligence. Likewise, those injured on the job who can no longer work can count on our attorneys for assistance in securing their rightful Social Security Disability and workers' compensation benefits.

Nearly A Century Of Experience Working For You

Founded in 1989 by award-winning and top-rated attorney Paul d'Oliveira, our law firm now has 15 locations across Rhode Island and Massachusetts, each providing a level of advocacy unmatched by other law firms.

Possessing nearly 100 years of combined legal experience, our attorneys are recognized leaders in their fields, and we have secured more than $200 million in settlements and awards on behalf of those we have served.

Fully Committed To Our Clients And Our Community

Committed to both our clients' needs and our community, our attorneys genuinely care about helping our clients find the peace of mind they deserve as they focus on their recovery, and our law firm has become the trusted source for not only high-quality, effective counsel, but for giving back to our community and providing for those less fortunate.

We Care About Your Needs

Compassionate, caring and competent, our attorneys stand ready to help you secure the finances you need to support yourself and your family during this difficult time in your life. To find out more, you can contact d'Oliveira & Associates P.C. to schedule a free initial consultation.
